member.name: T:Licitation.API.Controllers.DocumentsController
member.summary: Represents a controller to handle Document requests.

member.name: M:Licitation.API.Controllers.DocumentsController.#ctor(Licitation.API.Data.Repository.IDocumentRepository,AutoMapper.IMapper)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the DocumentsController class.
member.param: An instance of IDocumentRepository to handle the Documents.
An instance of IMapper to map between Document entities and models.

member.name: M:Licitation.API.Controllers.DocumentsController.GetDocuments
member.summary: Returns a list of Document models.
member.returns: A list of DocumentGetResponseModel models, or No Content if no Document found.

member.name: M:Licitation.API.Controllers.DocumentsController.GetDocument(System.Guid)
member.summary: Returns a Document model with the specified ID.
member.param: The ID of the Document to retrieve.
member.returns: A DocumentGetResponseModel model with the specified ID, or NotFound if no Document found.

member.name: M:Licitation.API.Controllers.DocumentsController.PatchDocument(System.Guid,Licitation.API.Models.Document.DocumentPatchRequestModel)
member.summary: Updates the specified Document with a set of changes.
member.param: The ID of the Document to update.
A DocumentPatchRequestModel containing the changes to apply.
member.returns: A DocumentPatchResponseModel model with the updated Document, or NotFound if no Document found.

member.name: M:Licitation.API.Controllers.DocumentsController.PostDocument(Licitation.API.Models.Document.DocumentPostRequestModel)
member.summary: Creates a new Document with the specified properties.
member.param: A DocumentPostRequestModel containing the properties of the new Document.
member.returns: A DocumentPostResponseModel model with the created Document, or BadRequest if the Document could not be created.

member.name: M:Licitation.API.Controllers.DocumentsController.DeleteDocument(System.Guid)
member.summary: Deletes the Document with the specified ID.
member.param: The ID of the Document to delete.
member.returns: NoContent if the Document was successfully deleted, or NotFound if no Document found.

member.name: T:Licitation.API.Controllers.LicitationController
member.summary: Controller for handling CRUD operations related to licitation entities.

An instance of ILicitationLandRepository to handle the LicitacionLands.
An instance of ILicitationPublicBiddingRepository to handle the LicitacionPublicBiddings.
An instance of IMapper to map between Licitacion entities and models.

member.name: M:Licitation.API.Controllers.LicitationController.GetLicitations
member.summary: Returns a list of Licitacions.
member.returns: A list of Licitacion models, or No Content if no Licitacion found.

member.name: M:Licitation.API.Controllers.LicitationController.GetByYear(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets all licitation entities that occurred in a specific year.
member.param: The year to filter by.
member.returns: An ActionResult of type LicitationResponseModel if successful, or NotFound if no results are found.

member.name: M:Licitation.API.Controllers.LicitationController.GetByGuid(System.Guid)
member.summary: Returns a Licitacion with the specified ID.
member.param: The ID of the Licitacion to retrieve.
member.returns: The Licitacion model with the specified ID, or NotFound if the ID does not match a Licitacion.

member.name: M:Licitation.API.Controllers.LicitationController.Delete(System.Guid)
member.summary: Deletes a Licitation by its ID.
member.param: The ID of the Licitation to be deleted.
member.returns: Returns a NoContent result if successful, or NotFound if the Licitation does not exist.

member.name: M:Licitation.API.Controllers.LicitationController.PostLicitation(Licitation.API.Models.Licitation.LicitationRequestModel)
member.summary: Creates a new Licitation.
member.param: The new Licitation information.
member.returns: Returns the created Licitation model, with a location header pointing to the URL of the newly created Licitation.

member.name: M:Licitation.API.Controllers.LicitationController.PatchLicitation(System.Guid,Licitation.API.Models.Licitation.LicitationUpdateModel)
member.summary: Updates a Licitation by its ID using a patch model.
member.param: The ID of the Licitation to be updated.
The patch model containing the updates.
member.returns: Returns the updated Licitation model, or BadRequest if the update fails, or NotFound if the Licitation does not exist.

member.name: M:Licitation.API.Controllers.LicitationController.PostLicitationLand(System.Guid,Licitation.API.Models.LicitationLands.LicitationLandPostRequestModel)
member.summary: Adds a Licitation Land to an existing Licitation.
member.param: The ID of the Licitation to which the Licitation Land should be added.
The Licitation Land information.
member.returns: Returns a NoContent result if successful, or BadRequest if the add operation fails.

member.returns: An action result containing the newly created Public Bidding
